name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. David JONES, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH, of Pennsylvania v. David JONES, Appellant.
attorneys: Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Alan Sacks, Asst. Dist. Attys., Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
446 A.2d 604
COMMONWEALTH, of Pennsylvania v. David JONES, Appellant.
No. 80-3-748.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted April 13, 1982.
Decided June 24, 1982.
Reconsideration Denied Sept. 13, 1982.
Kalvin Kahn, Philadelphia, (Court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Alan Sacks, Asst. Dist. Attys., Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
